name: Cornelius & Anthony - Mistress - Toro
additionalNotes:
That was the definition that Cornelius & Anthony based the name of one of their 2018 IPCPR Convention & Trade Show inclusions off of. Always the storytellers, Cornelius and Anthony gave a nod to what they felt many women tend to think of cigars as being when their significant others leave their 
Wrapped in an Ecuadorian Habano wrapper, The Mistress is composed of American-grown broadleaf binder and Pennsylvanian broadleaf ligero fillers, creating a full-bodied profile filled with with notes of sweet natural tobacco, earth, cinnamon, nutmeg, wood, and pepper to please the palate.
